moves.notesEN: Can be rapid canceled

moves.notesEN: 1 frames of recovery added when the attack misses
moves.notesCN: 攻击挥空+1f收招

moves.notesEN: Can be canceled until the 1st active frame Forces a juggle state when hitting a mid-air opponent
moves.notesCN: 知道第一帧打击帧之前都可以取消，击中空中对手造成浮空硬直

moves.notesEN: Produces a crumple stun on Punish Counter Forces a juggle state when hitting a mid-air opponent

moves.notesEN: Can be rapid canceled
moves.notesCN: 可以快速取消

moves.notesCN: 可以快速取消

moves.notesEN: 2 frames of recovery added when the attack misses
moves.notesCN: 攻击挥空+2f收招

moves.notesEN: Forces the opponent into a standing position Can be canceled until the 2nd active frame
moves.notesCN: 强制对手站立，第二帧打击帧之前可以取消

moves.notesEN: Knockdown time extended when the attack lands as a Punish Counter, and changes to Hard Knockdown Forces a juggle state when hitting a mid-air opponent * 1 frames of recovery added when the attack is blocked *Second attack is considered a high attack only when the first attack is blocked
moves.notesCN: 确反康强制倒地，且倒地时间增加。击中空中对手造成浮空硬直。被防+1f收招，当第一段攻击被格挡时，第二段攻击才被视为上段

moves.nameEN: Ransui Haze(1) (Drink level 4 or higher) H
Ransui Haze(2) (Drink level 4 or higher) H H
moves.notesEN: Available at Drink Level 4 Transitions even when the attack misses During the attack, press an attack button with specific timing to change the transition attack Frames 6-25: Ransui Haze 1 Frames 31-55: Ransui Haze 2 Frames 64-80: Ransui Haze 3
moves.notesCN: 四酒触发，即使攻击挥空依然能派生后续招式。最后一段派生根据输入时间可以有不同延迟：1，6-25帧输入，最速派生；2，31-55帧输入，延迟派生；3，64-80帧输入，最晚派生

moves.notesCN: 四酒触发

moves.notesCN: 四酒触发

moves.notesEN: Available at Drink Level 4 Recovers 10,000 Drive Gauge
moves.notesCN: 四酒触发，回复10000点斗气槽

moves.notesEN: Adds a Drink level on frame 49 If Drink level is already at 4, recovers 5,000 Drive Gauge Holding the button continues the action, and will only add to the Drink level for as long as the button is held When the button is held for only one level, the entire move is 97 frames Damage increases in line with Drink level, and new moves are available Damage scaling per Drin kLevel Drink Level 0: 90% Drink Level 1: 95% Drink Level 2: 100% Drink Level 3: 105% Drink Level 4: 110% * During The Devil's Song, damage is scaled to 105%
moves.notesCN: 第49帧加一酒，如果四酒则回复5000点斗气。动作可以通过按住按钮持续。在按住按钮且只加一酒的情况下，动作持续97帧。角色伤害修正随喝酒层数线性递增：1，0酒：90%；2，1酒：95%；3，2酒：100；4，3酒：105%；5，四酒：110。SA2魔身状态下伤害修正为105%。

moves.notesEN: Available at Drink Level 3 or higher Produces a crumple stun on hit

moves.notesEN: Invincible to throws and strikes from frames 1 - 12 Minimum guaranteed damage is set to 30% Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter * While the attack is executed, continue to hold Down to change the attack's properties and raise your Drink level by 1
moves.notesCN: 1-12帧打投无敌，保底修正30%，伤害不会随打康类型改变

moves.notesEN: Temporarily raises Drink level to 4 Note: Damage is increased to 105% Timer is active for 900 frames If this move is performed when the player is already at Drink level 4, the player instead recovers 30,000 to the Drive Gauge
moves.notesCN: 暂时将醉意提升至四酒，持续900帧，修正提升为105%。如果四酒状态下，则回复30000斗气

moves.notesEN: Completely invincible from frames 1 - 12 Minimum guaranteed damage is set to 50% Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter * Produces a hard knockdown
moves.notesCN: 1-12帧无敌，保底修正50%，伤害不会因为打康类型改变，强制倒地

moves.notesEN: Completely invincible from frames 1 - 12 Minimum guaranteed damage is set to 50% Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter * Forces a hard knockdown
moves.notesCN: 1-12帧无敌，保底修正50%，伤害不会因为打康类型改变，强制倒地

moves.nameEN: Back Shaver (When near opponent) L L
moves.notesEN: Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter: - Deals 2040 damage - Super Art gauge increases by 4000 - Forces a hard knockdown *Hold down the button during the technique to change its properties and raise drink level by 1
moves.notesCN: 投到确反康性质变化：1，伤害增加为2040；2，超级必杀槽增加4000；3，强制倒地

moves.nameEN: Wheel Punch (When near opponent) L L
moves.notesEN: Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter: - Deals 2040 damage - Super Art gauge increases by 4000 - Forces a hard knockdown
moves.notesCN: 投到确反康性质变化：1，伤害增加为2040；2，超级必杀槽增加4000；3，强制倒地

moves.notesEN: Invincible to throws from frames 1 - 15
moves.notesCN: 第1-15帧对投无敌

moves.nameEN: Drive Impact: Vainglory Strike H H
moves.notesEN: Super Armor for 2 attacks from frames 1 - 27 Produces a wall splat if the pushback on hit causes the opponent to connect with the stage wall On Punish Counter or after a successful hit after Super Armor absorbs a hit, the following properties change: - Produces a crumple stun if the opponent is standing on the ground - Forces a spinning knockdown when hitting a mid-air opponent - Super Art gauge increases by 3000
moves.notesCN: 第1-27帧两次打击霸体，版边会造成对手墙崩。打到确反康性质变化：1，会造成对手进入崩防硬直；2，命中浮空对手时浮空硬直时间增加；3，超级必杀槽增加3000

moves.nameEN: Drive Reversal (while blocking): Leg Sweep (When blocking or during a successful Drive Parry) H H
moves.notesEN: Recoverable damage Completely invincible on frames 1 - 22 5 frames of recovery added on hit
moves.notesCN: 伤害为白血，第1-22帧无敌，击中对手增加5f收招

moves.nameEN: Drive Reversal (while recovering): Leg Sweep (During knockdown recovery) H H
moves.notesEN: Recoverable damage Completely invincible on frames 1 - 20 5 frames of recovery added on hit
moves.notesCN: 伤害为白血，第1-20帧无敌，击中对手增加5f收招

moves.notesEN: *1 Can be canceled from the 4th frame via Drive Rush *2 Parry hitbox is extended for as long as the buttons are held Only blocks can be performed during the recovery period Always in Punish Counter state during execution.
moves.notesCN: 1，从第4帧开始能被绿冲取消；2，蓝防判定会随着按钮的时间延长，但是在蓝防的收招动作中仅有格挡能够取消蓝防的收招，在蓝防动作的持续中，只要被攻击命中就必定为确反康

moves.nameEN: Perfect Parry (strike) Block Direction M M
moves.notesEN: Perfect Parry activates when an attack is absorbed on the frame a parry is input, or on the next frame. (For high and overhead attacks, the player must press the direction away from the opponent. For low attacks, down and back) If no direction is inputted the result will be a regular parry with an additional Drive increase of 3000. Fully invincible for 5 frames once recovery is over (invincibility not granted if you continue the parry) The player on the receiving end of a Perfect Parry cannot cancel and is forced into a Punish Counter state until their move is finished
moves.notesCN: 在输入蓝防的当前帧或下一帧被打击时，会触发完美精防，（对上段/中段攻击，需同时输入后，对下段攻击需同时输入下后）。如果没有输入任何方向，则判定为普通蓝防，但额外增加3000点斗气槽回复。完美精防结束后获得5f的无敌帧（如果持续按住蓝防则不获得）。被完美精防的一方在动作结束前不能取消招式，且如果在动作结束前被击中则一定是确反康

moves.notesEN: Perfect Parry activates when an attack is absorbed on the frame a parry is input, or on the next frame No screen freeze occurs. The player on the receiving end of a Perfect Parry cannot cancel and is forced into a Punish Counter state until their move is finished
moves.notesCN: 在输入蓝防的当前帧或下一帧被打击时，会触发完美精防，不会出现屏幕冻结特效，被精防波动的一方不能取消动作，且在动作结束前被命中一定会出确反康

moves.nameEN: Parry Drive Rush (During a Drive Parry)
moves.notesEN: Screen freeze occurs until the 10th frame * Can be canceled into an attack on the 9th frame of the move Can be canceled into actions other than a parry from the 24th frame
moves.notesCN: 第1-10帧出现屏幕冻结特效，第9帧开始能够被攻击动作取消，第24帧开始能被除了蓝防以外的任何动作取消

moves.nameEN: Cancel Drive Rush (While connecting with a special-cancelable move) ( ) M M
moves.notesEN: Screen freeze occurs until the 9th frame * Can be canceled into an attack from the 10th frame of the move Can be canceled into actions other than a parry from the 25th frame
moves.notesCN: 第1-9帧出现屏幕冻结特效，第10帧开始可以被攻击动作取消，第25帧开始可以被除了蓝防以外的任何动作取消
